comment: She had simple quizzes and exams (no lockdown) & also had interactive activities in class. Attendance was a grade but really useful class. She responds to emails quickly & is willing to help out with anything you may need. She taught us about skills needed to get a job and brought in guest speakers! She gave great resources as well. Take her!!!

I loved her! Quizzes and tests were super easy and open note, usually common knowledge and she gives you everything you need to know. Attendance is mandatory, but I took her in person class and every class was fun and you learned a lot especially, if you are an IHS major. Overall one of my favorite and easiest classes I've taken so far at KSU.
